sources.data_found: The HPC at Illinois State has 1 Login Node & 1 Head Node (User/Schedule), 24 Compute Nodes, 1 Big Mem Node & 2 GPU Nodes (Compute Cluster), and 1 Storage Node (Data Storage), for a total of 30 Nodes.
As of September 2024, total on-campus enrollment was 21,546, with 19,107 undergraduate students and 2,439 graduate students.

In 2023, the most popular Bachelors Degree concentrations at Illinois State University were Elementary Education & Teaching (289 degrees awarded), General Marketing & Marketing Management (256 degrees), and Registered Nursing (215 degrees).

The School of Information Technology participates in the Minor in Cognitive Science program. Degree Offered: B.S. This degree is designed for students who wish to pursue a comprehensive study of computer science that blends theory, abstraction, and design in a variety of traditional and current areas.

student_data.notes: Exact CS enrollment numbers not found in public sources. Estimate based on: Illinois State has School of Information Technology offering CS degrees; total enrollment is 20,989 (2023); has accredited CS programs per ABET; DataUSA shows strong STEM programs but doesn't break down by major. Conservative estimate of ~3% of undergrads in CS (600 of 18,450) and ~6% of grads (150 of 2,539). ISU does not appear to offer PhD in CS based on searches.

other_high_vram_gpus.notes: Illinois State HPC has 2 GPU nodes but specific GPU models not disclosed in public documentation

gpu_resources.notes: Illinois State University HPC cluster includes 2 GPU nodes according to official documentation, but specific GPU models (H100, A100, etc.) are not publicly disclosed. The cluster has 30 total nodes including: 24 compute nodes, 1 big memory node, 2 GPU nodes, plus login/head/storage nodes. Without access to detailed technical specifications or procurement records, cannot determine exact GPU counts.

analysis_notes: Illinois State University has a modest HPC infrastructure with 2 GPU nodes, but lacks publicly available detailed specifications. Student enrollment data shows a large university (20,989 total) but specific CS enrollment numbers are not published. University offers CS degrees through School of Information Technology with ABET accreditation.
